sentence: In a separate statement dated three days prior, Secretary Cardona warned Governor Ron DeSantis over the Florida Republican's "Don't Say Gay" bill, saying, "we will be monitoring this law upon implementation to evaluate whether it violates federal civil rights law.
author: David Badash
title: Who would Jesus exclude?: Marco Rubio mocked for kicking off Pride Month with bizarre claim
DeSantis overrules lawmakers, rejects penalties for school mask mandates
